author: Epic Games
description:
The perfect game to play on the daily... even Mondays. Garfield Kart 2 - All You Can Drift is now available! https://epic.gm/garfield-kart-2

Play as one of the eight characters from the Garfield universe, fill up your karts, customize your look, and race away at breakneck speeds.
title: Garfield Kart 2 - All You Can Drift | Launch Trailer
